title: Face Recognition System
description: System that uses facial recognition to mark attendance.

title: Image Captioning
description: This project implements an Image Captioning system that generates natural language descriptions for images, leveraging a Vision Transformer (ViT) as the encoder and GPT-2 as the decoder.

title: Gaming vs Gambling
description: Application which classifies apps as either gaming or gambling based on their description, permissions, and user reviews from the Google Play Store

title: MediTracker
description: MediTracker is a web app that helps users manage medication schedules and log intake with an intuitive interface.

title: Dehazing of images
description: Developed a model using ResNet to remove atmospheric haze from images by learning residual features.

title: Translator
description: Implements a Transformer model for translating text from English to Italian

title: Video Synopsis
description: Brief summary that captures the key themes, events, and tone of a video, offering viewers a quick overview of its content.

title: Steering Angle Prediction
description: The steering angle prediction uses ResNet-18, It consisting of an Encoder, Spatial Pyramid Pooling, and a Decoder.

title: Tokenizer
description: This step is essential for transforming human-readable text into machine-readable numerical data, enabling Large Language Models (LLMs) to process and understand language effectively.

title: AI agent for sheets
description: Gathering data from the net involves collecting information from websites

title: PhotoJournel
description: Manage their photos and create a journal of their memories.

title: Basic Banking System
description: It provides functionalities for banking operations such as transfers.
